Text: the very first of star wars, 1977!
I guess there's something wrong with all Star Wars torrents coz whenever I start downloading them transmission and vuze stops working.

I usually avoid 1080p because I have a low BW cap at my ISP, but I didn't see what looked to be any good ~2GB 720p versions.

I am not disappointed with the larger BW needed for this. 

It is a superb encode. I was watching it 3 feet from my 40" TV and it looks perfect. Excellent surround sound as well.

A-10
V-10

Thank you Murdoc47.
Video quality is awesome.

Does anyone else have a problem with AC3 /6 channel sound or is it just me!
Anyone know how to play this on a 360 ? I don't mind watching it on my laptop but I would also like to watch it on my LCD.
